sections.contents:
# Welcome

Welcome to my awesome book.

Thanks to all !

Momanddad
The dog
My imaginary friend Serge
I am just there, not linked to ``content.md``. I should be put at the end of content by alphabetical order.

resources.title: Bridging the mire between e-research and e-publishing for multimedia digital scholarship in the humanities and social sciences: {An} {Australian} case study
